segments.text: Hi , taxi.Could you take me to the financial street , please
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to go to the financial stree .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , how long does it take to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It usually takes about half an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , does it really a long way to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Moreover , since the street is heavy with traffic this time of day . I'm not sure we can make it . By the way , are you pressed for the time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm not.you can just drive slowly and carefully .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , is the fair the same for any distance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . It versa according to the distance , you can read from the meter .
segments.speaker: S2
